review_data.title: Bad experience , no newspapers anymore
review_data.content: Bad experience : unfriendly staff, croissant (whole wheat) tasted like from yesterday, and they don’t offer any newspapers anymore

review_data.title: Nice stop off en route to airport
review_data.content: Friendly staff who even suffered our attempt at German! Nice little tartlet tomato and ricotta and the quiche went down well also! Not really enough space for some one with a disability but we managed. A good place to stop en route to the airport!!!...More

review_data.title: Take-away Kaffee besteht zu 80 Prozent aus Schaum!
review_data.content: Meine Kritik umfasst den Take-away Kaffee der Bäckerei Stocker. Den bekommt man in einem Becher aufgehändigt, der Deckel ist dann...More

review_data.title: Just so so
review_data.content: The Cafe Stocker is located at bus/tram stop Rigiblick. The place has sidewalk and patio seating areas, while inside there are wooden tables, benches and chairs. There is also a three-tiered wall seating corner, sort of like stadium seating. Newspapers and magazines are available for...More

review_data.title: An OK surrogate for the "real thing"...
review_data.content: ...as the favourite cake place had closed for the day and we wanted cake we ended up in this place. The cremeschnitte (mille feuille with creme) was nice, not extraordinary, the latte macchiato ok. Some annoying customers around, but who cares when you are in...More
